channel.title: UCSB Bridge Club
channel.description: Recent content on UCSB Bridge Club

item.title: Welcome back to the 3rd Year of UCSB Bridge Club
item.description: Hello everyone, and welcome to Year Three of the UCSB Bridge Club! I am very excited for another year filled with fun, food, friends, and finesses as we seek to build upon a wildly successful 2018-19. I have high hopes for more success this year, both in terms of growing our club and as relates to our competitive aspirations in the College Bridge Bowl. I look forward to having many of you along for the ride!

item.title: Resources
item.description: System Document Most players in our club play 2-over-1, with a generally agreed set of options. This document gives an overview of the bidding system we use. Slides These are the slides from various lessons that have been given at club meetings. Doubles No-Trump Opening Bids and Responses Preempts Responding Slam Bidding Scoring Bridge Base Bridge Base is an website for playing bridge online, either with other people or robots.
